info.name: MixCloud Accessibility Fixes
info.description:
- Adds a proper horizontal scrollbar to the playlist at the bottom of the page, so you can scan through long lists without wearing out your mousewheel or your hand. Phew!
- Higher contrast play rings means you can more easily see which mixes have been listened or partially listened.
info.additionalInfo:
V2.0.0 - 2020-07-12
Updated for new CSS classnames and added high contrast play rings.

V1.1.0 - 2020-02-19
Updated for the new (and ugly) Mixcloud 10 theme.

V1.0.0 - 2018-08-15
Initial release of MixCloud Playlist Horizontal Scrollbar.

This style was previously used for a DeviantArt skin and has been reused for something else, because UserStyles.org doesn't allow us to delete styles.
